newsitem.title: GERMANY: Traxon cargo system sees 29.7pct global Oct growth.
newsitem.headline: Traxon cargo system sees 29.7pct global Oct growth.

text.p: Air cargo communications system Traxon said it increased its global transmissions volume by 29.7 percent to 779,900 in October compared to the previous month.
The German market grew 35.6 percent, Europe increased by 40 percent, Asia by 35.3 percent and North America by 8.6 percent, a Traxon Europe statement released here said.
The number of air waybills transmitted electronically grew by 50.7 percent in October compared to September, but no absolute figure was released.
The total number of transmissions over the first ten months of the year was 31.5 percent higher than the same period last year, Traxon said.
Electronic transmission of air waybills has grown 65 percent January-October this year compared to last year, it added.

Traxon is represented worldwide and links 16 airlines with 1,824 freight forwarders whose office network covers 4,713 outlets, the statement added. --Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax +44 171 542 5017
